turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you place a coffee order for me from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay which Starbucks would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Sunshine in Springfield please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful. What will you be having today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a London Fog Tea Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my milk options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2%, almond, coconut, whole milk, nonfat milk, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any added flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an extra shot of vanilla added.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so I've got a Venti hot London Fog Tea Latte with almond milk and extra vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your drink is on order at the Starbucks on Sunshine in Springfield and will be ready for pick up shortly. I will send the receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.
